1332.title: Vouchers Can be Redeemed for Cash

tosdr.case: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

6317.quoteText:
When you subscribe to or use our Services, we collect the following personal information from you:
  • Contact information such as name, email address, Instant Messaging address, mailing address (including country of residence, and telephone number;
  • Billing information such as credit card information, and billing address;
  • Demographic information such as birth year, gender and occupation;
  • Information concerning your personal preferences, such as preferred airport, and other personal interests;
  • Information about your transactions with us and our business partners through our Services. and
  • Your IP address and, when using our Mobile Application, data such as device type and OS version. Note, you are not anonymous to us when you sign in to our Services.
6317.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: The service collects many different types of personal data

6318.quoteText:
Travelzoo does not rent or sell personal information about you to third parties, however, we reserve the right to share the personal information we collect about you through our Services with third parties when we have your permission or under the following circumstances: <ul>
<li>If you are making a purchase on the Site, we often work with third parties and trusted business partners to securely collect your credit card, billing address and other verifying information.
Our third parties partners are required to follow generally accepted industry standards to protect the personal information they receive and/or process on our behalf.
6318.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

6319.quoteText: Note, if you choose to decline cookies, you may not be able to fully experience all the features of our Online Services.
6319.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

6320.quoteText:
• A web beacon is activated as part of a web page or email and allows us to count visitors to our websites and to recognize users by accessing Travelzoo cookies which help us personalize your experience when you use our Services.
  • Travelzoo also uses web beacons to conduct research on behalf of our partners and for auditing purposes.
6320.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
